thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.net
thread.title: Annie Allen

author: Annie Allen
title: Annie Allen
text:
Thank you it was great receiving assistance on booking a ticket ex JHB to PE return.
Karan Chawla was very understanding of my difficulty booking online and kindly assisted telephonically.
Subsequent to this, I am hugely dissatisfied with this organisation.
My booking has been cancelled, funds taken from my account, with no refund as yet and I had an argument with the person telephonically that advise that the funds had been refunded, but with me looking at my bank statement, I can only see the funds been taken and not refunded. Sounds like a scam to me!!
I regret ever submitting the review above.
